plugins.name: ai
plugins.description_zh: AI 增强功能插件（如向量嵌入、语义搜索）
plugins.description_en: AI-enhanced features (e.g., vector embeddings, semantic search)

plugins.name: analysis-hanlp
plugins.description_zh: 基于 HanLP 的中文自然语言处理分词与分析
plugins.description_en: Chinese NLP tokenization and analysis based on HanLP

plugins.name: analysis-icu
plugins.description_zh: 基于 ICU 的 Unicode 文本分析插件，支持多语言分词与规范化
plugins.description_en: Unicode text analysis plugin based on ICU, supporting multi-language tokenization and normalization

plugins.name: analysis-ik
plugins.description_zh: IK 中文分词器，支持细粒度和智能分词
plugins.description_en: IK Chinese tokenizer supporting fine-grained and smart segmentation

plugins.name: analysis-morphology
plugins.description_zh: 多语言词形还原（Lemmatization）与词干提取（Stemming）
plugins.description_en: Multi-language lemmatization and stemming for morphological analysis

plugins.name: analysis-pinyin
plugins.description_zh: 拼音分词与搜索支持插件
plugins.description_en: Pinyin-based tokenization and search support

plugins.name: analysis-stconvert
plugins.description_zh: 简繁体中文转换插件
plugins.description_en: Simplified-Traditional Chinese conversion plugin

plugins.name: cross-cluster-replication
plugins.description_zh: 跨集群复制（CCR）功能，支持索引级数据同步
plugins.description_en: Cross-Cluster Replication (CCR) for index-level data synchronization

plugins.name: ingest-common
plugins.description_zh: 通用 Ingest 处理器（如 set、remove、rename 等）
plugins.description_en: Common Ingest processors (e.g., set, remove, rename)

plugins.name: ingest-geoip
plugins.description_zh: 基于 MaxMind GeoIP 数据库的地理位置解析处理器
plugins.description_en: Geolocation resolution processor using MaxMind GeoIP database

plugins.name: ingest-user-agent
plugins.description_zh: 解析 User-Agent 字符串的 Ingest 处理器
plugins.description_en: User-Agent string parsing processor

plugins.name: jieba
plugins.description_zh: 结巴中文分词插件
plugins.description_en: Jieba Chinese word segmentation plugin

plugins.name: knn
plugins.description_zh: 向量近似最近邻（KNN）搜索支持
plugins.description_en: Approximate k-Nearest Neighbor (KNN) vector search support

plugins.name: mapper-annotated-text
plugins.description_zh: 支持带注解文本的字段映射
plugins.description_en: Field mapper for annotated text

plugins.name: mapper-murmur3
plugins.description_zh: 为字段添加 MurmurHash3 哈希值
plugins.description_en: Adds MurmurHash3 hash values to fields

plugins.name: mapper-size
plugins.description_zh: 记录字段原始字节大小
plugins.description_en: Records the original byte size of fields

plugins.name: rules
plugins.description_zh: 规则引擎插件，支持基于条件的数据处理
plugins.description_en: Rule engine plugin for conditional data processing

plugins.name: sql
plugins.description_zh: SQL 查询支持，允许使用 SQL 语法查询 Easysearch
plugins.description_en: SQL query support, enabling SQL syntax to query Easysearch

plugins.name: transport-nio
plugins.description_zh: 基于 NIO 的高性能传输模块
plugins.description_en: High-performance NIO-based transport module

plugins.name: ui
plugins.description_zh: Web 管理界面插件
plugins.description_en: Web-based management UI plugin
